endpoint.name: Alfresco - unauthenticated access
endpoint.description: Access to Alfresco Repository WebScripts that do not require authentication

endpoint.name: Alfresco - user access
endpoint.description: Access to Alfresco Repository WebScripts that require user authentication

endpoint.name: Alfresco Feed
endpoint.description: Alfresco Feed - supports basic HTTP authentication via the EndPointProxyServlet

endpoint.name: Activiti Admin UI - user access
endpoint.description: Access to Activiti Admin UI, that requires user authentication
